description: Looking for someone to sublet my room while I am away for work this summer. TV, cooking utensils, and cutlery is provided. Utilities not included.
Looking for a subletter while I go abroad next semester. The room comes with 4 great roommates and two bathrooms. Lots of video games and movies watched in the common room. Utilities not included.

Subletter needed ASAP! Last person bailed out on me last minute, looking for someone to sublet while I go home for Winter break. Really great unit. Awesome location and upstairs neighbors are super nice.
Subletter needed for next summer. Quick walk to the T Station in Davis. Really nice unit with friendly roommates. Email for more information.
